Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.datastore

Class StudentDetail

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.datastore.BaseDatabaseHandler
comp3111.examsystem.datastore.StudentDetail
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserDetail
public class StudentDetail extends BaseDatabaseHandler implements UserDetail
Singleton class for managing student details and authentication Implements UserDetail interface for user verification functionality

    • getUserPassword

      Pair<String,Boolean> getUserPassword(String username)
      Retrieves the password for a given username from the student database
      Parameters:
      username - The username to look up
      Returns:
      A Pair containing the password and a boolean indicating if the username was found The boolean is true if the username exists, false otherwise

    • verify

      public boolean verify(String username, String password)
      Verifies the username and password combination
      Specified by:
      verify in interface UserDetail
      Parameters:
      username - The username to verify
      password - The password to verify
      Returns:
      true if the credentials are valid, false otherwise

    • addUser

      public int addUser(String[] record)
      Adds a new student to the database
      Specified by:
      addUser in interface UserDetail
      Parameters:
      record - Array containing student details: [0] - username [1] - name [2] - gender [3] - age [4] - department [5] - password [6] - confirm password
      Returns:
      Status code: 0 - Success -1 - Insufficient entries -2 - Username already exists -3 - Age is not numeric -4 - Password mismatch -5 - File write failed

    • updateUser

      public int updateUser(String oldUsername, String newUsername, String[] record)
      Updates an existing student's information including the ability to change username
      Parameters:
      oldUsername - Current username of the student to update
      newUsername - New username for the student (null if no change)
      record - Array containing updated student details: [0] - name [1] - gender [2] - age [3] - department [4] - password [5] - confirm password
      Returns:
      Status code: 0 - Success -1 - Insufficient entries -2 - Student not found -3 - Age is not numeric -4 - Password mismatch -5 - File write failed -6 - New username already exists

    • removeUser

      public int removeUser(String username)
      Removes a student from the database
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the student to remove
      Returns:
      Status code: 0 - Success -1 - File write failed -2 - Student not found

    • getAllStudents

      public String[] getAllStudents()
      Gets a list of all student usernames in the system
      Returns:
      Array of student usernames, empty array if error occurs
